name: Muhammad Sami Tariq

projects.title: Interactive Demo & Guided Tour Tool with Chrome Extension
projects.description: Developed an interactive product demo and tutorial tool, similar to Navattic, enabling users to capture HTML frames and overlay tooltips to create guided walkthroughs. Built a dedicated Chrome extension to seamlessly capture and process HTML structures, allowing users to annotate and save interactive elements for onboarding experiences.

projects.title: Uniswap Education Hub â€“ Interactive Learning for DeFi Users
projects.description: Designed and developed an educational platform for Uniswap, featuring in-depth courses, interactive guides, structured learning timelines, short video tutorials, and hands-on clickable demos. The platform aimed to simplify decentralized finance (DeFi) concepts, providing users with an engaging and structured learning experience to navigate Uniswap effectively.

projects.title: Fruit Freshness Detection Application
projects.description: Designed a react-native mobile app for detecting fruit and vegetable freshness using two self-trained neural networks hosted on AWS for categorization and freshness detection. The collected dataset consists of 10k images and 26 classes

projects.title: Compound Learning Hub â€“ Bite-Sized DeFi Education
projects.description: Built an educational platform for Compound, focusing on tidbitsâ€”concise, easily digestible insights that simplify complex DeFi concepts. The platform included structured courses, interactive guides, short video tutorials, and engaging clickable demos to help users quickly grasp key aspects of lending, borrowing, and yield optimization on Compound.

projects.title: BeraTrax: Simplifying DeFi Interactions on Berachain
projects.description: As a Full Stack Developer at BeraTrax, I contributed to the development of a mobile-first decentralized finance (DeFi) platform tailored for the Berachain ecosystem. BeraTrax offers users an intuitive interface to engage with DeFi services, including seamless swaps, liquidity provision, and yield optimization. The platform emphasizes user-friendly design, real-time performance insights, and robust security measures to enhance the DeFi experience.

projects.title: Governance Tooling & Automation for Compound Protocol
projects.description: Led the development of governance tooling and automation to enhance decision-making in the Compound Protocol. A key initiative focused on streamlining market parameter updates by introducing a parallel process, reducing friction in governance. This allowed the community to shift focus towards strategic decisions, such as new partnerships and asset integrations, improving the efficiency and agility of the protocolâ€™s governance framework.

aboutpara: I'm Muhammad Sami Tariq, a passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in building scalable web applications, robust backend architectures, and modern frontend frameworks. My expertise spans across React, Next.js, FastAPI, Node.js, and Dockerized microservices, enabling me to develop high-performance solutions that optimize efficiency and user experience.
